Getting Involved with the New Mexico LoCo Team is easy.

=== Joining the Team ===
To join the team, please do the following:

 {*} Read the Ubuntu Code of Conduct, if you have not already done so. The LoCo's conduct is governed by the Code of Conduct and you must agree to it in order to join. 

 {*} Add yourself to the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-newmexico|Launchpad]]</nowiki> project. 

 {*} Sign up for the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-nm|Mailing List]]</nowiki>.

 {*} Add yourself to the <nowiki>[[NewMexicoTeam-Members|Members]]</nowiki> list.

 {*} ''(Optional)'' Join the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/NewMexicoTeam/IRC|IRC]]</nowiki> channel.

That's it! You're done. Now, sit back and consider yourself a member.
